scripts.build: pnpm --dir client build && pnpm --dir server build
scripts.install-all: pnpm install && pnpm server-install && pnpm client-install
scripts.rei-all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && pnpm install && pnpm server-install && pnpm client-install
scripts.redis:start: bash -lc 'docker rm -f redis-local >/dev/null 2>&1 || true && docker run --rm --name redis-local -p 6379:6379 redis:7-alpine'
scripts.dev: pnpm redis:auto && concurrently "pnpm --dir server dev" "pnpm --dir client dev"
